:is-up-to-date: True

.. _crafter-engine-api-site-cache-clear:

=============
Clear
=============

Clear the content cache scope and the Freemarker cache for the current site context.

--------------------
Resource Information
--------------------

.. include:: /includes/tomcat-api-url-prefix.rst

+----------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------------------+
|| HTTP Verb                 || GET                                                              |
+----------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------------------+
|| URL                       || ``/api/1/site/cache/clear``                                      |
+----------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------------------+
|| Response Formats          || ``JSON``                                                         |
+----------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------------------+

----------
Parameters
----------

+-------------------------+-------------+---------------+--------------------------------------+
|| Name                   || Type       || Required     || Description                         |
+=========================+=============+===============+======================================+
|| token                  || String     || |checkmark|  || The authorization token             |
+-------------------------+-------------+---------------+--------------------------------------+

-------
Example
-------

^^^^^^^
Request
^^^^^^^

``GET .../api/1/site/cache/clear?token=defaultManagementToken``

^^^^^^^^
Response
^^^^^^^^

``Status 200 OK``

.. code-block:: json

  { "message":"Cache clear for site 'sample' started" }

---------
Responses
---------

+---------+------------------+--------------------------------------------------------------------+
|| Status || Location        || Response Body                                                     |
+=========+==================+====================================================================+
|| 200    ||                 || See example above.                                                |
+---------+------------------+--------------------------------------------------------------------+
|| 400    ||                 || ``{"message":"Required String parameter 'token' is not present"}``|
+---------+------------------+--------------------------------------------------------------------+
|| 401    ||                 || ``{"message":"Management authorization failed, invalid token."}`` |
+---------+------------------+--------------------------------------------------------------------+
|| 500    ||                 || ``{ "message" : "Internal server error" }``                       |
+---------+------------------+--------------------------------------------------------------------+
